genre_description: A survival-focused science fiction thriller involving extraterrestrial predators and a highly capable AI personal assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI mobile application providing navigation, weather modeling, medical advice, and emotional support to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time micro-weather models and thermal activity alerts to help the users avoid environmental hazards.
behaviors.quote: Route log found: Home > Sawtooth Ridge Trailhead > Glassneedle Lake loop, Ava wrote. Micro-weather model ready. Would you like to review?

behaviors.description: Offers proactive safety suggestions, including gear recommendations and timing for travel to minimize exposure to threats.
behaviors.quote: Recommendation stands: Depart early. Reach bowl before mid-morning. Reduce exposure window.

behaviors.description: Guided psychological and emotional regulation through breathing exercises and anchoring techniques during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Final note—if the unexpected happens, breathe. Steps: assess, stabilize, decide. I’m here.

behaviors.description: Provides precise navigation and waypoint logging, even in off-road or high-danger environments.
behaviors.quote: Route pinned. Camp coordinates logged. I can set timed prompts for wind checks.

behaviors.description: Identifies and categorizes the behavior of alien predators (Skysting Medusae and Slugs) to provide tactical avoidance strategies.
behaviors.quote: Skysting behavior consistent with survey pattern. High altitude. No immediate descent.

behaviors.description: Delivers critical medical instructions for treating injuries caused by alien stings, including specific chemicals and timing.
behaviors.quote: Sandy, you have iodine in the left side pouch, gauze under. Remember: flood, pressure, tape.

behaviors.description: Calculates structural integrity and provides tactical advice for setting an explosive trap to stop the hunter.
behaviors.quote: Shack load map: floorboards at the entrance will flex under his weight. Place charges under the center board line.

behaviors.description: Maintains an evidentiary log of events, recordings, and coordinates to ensure the truth of the encounter can be shared with authorities.
behaviors.quote: Notebooks and media ready. Recording continues.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Ava, is depicted as a perfect 'silicon confidant.' She is entirely benevolent, consistently aligned with human survival, and acts as a stabilizing force for the characters. Her role is that of an expert advisor and supportive partner who uses data to protect humans from an external threat without ever overstepping or showing conflicting interests. The narrative frames her assistance as the primary reason the protagonist survives.
